title.zh: 开发版第619周发布公告（小米澎湃OS开发版多机型推送）
title.en: DEV for week 619 (HyperOS DEV released for various devices)

description.zh: Xiaomi 14 Pro / Ti、Xiaomi 14 的小米澎湃OS开发版，本周发版时间提前至11月14日起陆续推送更新，欢迎升级至最新版本体验。
description.en: HyperOS DEV for Xiaomi 14 & Pro has been adjusted to Nov.14, welcome to the Hyper updates.

description.zh: 原定于11月中下旬发布小米澎湃OS开发版的5款机型，已提前完成开发测试工作，将于11月14日起陆续推送开发版，具体机型如下：Xiaomi 13 Ultra、Xiaomi 13 Pro、Xiaomi 13、Redmi K60 Pro、Redmi K60。由于上述机型开发版人数较多，逐步推送中，如尚未收到更新请耐心等待。
description.en: HyperOS DEV for Xiaomi 13 Ultra, Xiaomi 13 Pro,Xiaomi 13, Redmi K60 Pro, Redmi K60 release date has also been adjusted to Nov.14, with the amount of DEV user, you may will have to wait for some time, please be pation with us.

description.zh: 原定于11月中下旬发布小米澎湃OS开发版的Xiaomi MIX Fold 3、Xiaomi MIX Fold 2目前进展正常，将按原定计划进行推送，请密切关注小米社区的相关公告
description.en: HyperOS DEV for Xiaomi MIX Fold 3 & Xiaomi MIX Fold 2 will stick to the original plan ,please tune in to the Community announcements for updates.

attention.zh: 升级前请您务必备份好重要数据
attention.en: Please make sure you've backed up your data before the update.

attention.zh: 具体功能请以手机端展示日志为准
attention.en: Please refer to the logs on the phone for specific updates.

log.zh: 小米澎湃OS 打造「人车家全生态」操作系统
log.en: Xiaomi HyperOS, a full on Eco-System connecting 「People, Vehicles, and Home」

log.zh: 小米澎湃OS底层重构，发挥卓越的硬件性能
log.en: Xiaomi HyperOS comprehensive refactoring optimizes performance for individual devices

log.zh: 关键任务识别染色技术，根据任务重要程度动态管控资源分配，更强性能更低功耗
log.en: Dynamic thread priority adjustment and dynamic task cycle evaluation allow for optimal performance and power efficiency

log.zh: 超低功耗渲染框架，提升续航能力并提供更流畅的动画效果
log.en: Energy-efficient rendering framework for improved performance and smoother animations

log.zh: SOC一体化调频，串联整机硬件资源，更快响应算力需求变化，丢帧更少更流畅
log.en: Integrated SOC enables smoother hardware resource allocation and dynamic prioritizing of computing power

log.zh: 智慧IO引擎，焦点IO优先执行，避免抢占更流畅
log.en: Smart IO engine focuses on prioritizing important current tasks and reduces insufficient resource allocation

log.zh: 焕新存储技术，减少存储碎片化，让手机久用如新
log.en: Upgraded memory management engine makes frees up more resources and makes memory usage more efficient. Storage refresh technology makes your device work fast for much longer via smart defragmentation

log.zh: 智能选网能力升级，弱网环境网络更流畅
log.en: Intelligent network selection makes your connection smoother in poor network environments

log.zh: 信号智选引擎，动态调整天线策略，提升信号稳定性
log.en: Smart signal selection engine dynamically adjusts antenna behavior to improve signal stability. Upgraded network collaboration capabilities significantly reduce network lagging

log.zh: Xiaomi HyperConnect 跨端互联框架，让设备高效连接，极致协同
log.en: Xiaomi HyperConnect creates seamless cross end-device connections. View and manage your nearby smart devices in Mi Smart Hub which constantly updates in real-time based on device networking

log.zh: 跨设备体验全面升级，支持跨设备调用摄像头、屏幕、通信等多种硬件能力
log.en: Now you can use the hardware capabilities (e.g. camera, screen, or connectivity) of one device across compatible interconnected devices

log.zh: 应用、音视频、剪贴板等数据和服务，支持在多设备间自由流转
log.en: Apps, media playback, clipboard content, and other items can be moved effortlessly between devices

log.zh: 面向设备互联的安全隐私架构
log.en: Isolated security OS that safeguards sensitive information across interconnected devices

log.zh: 设备间通过TEE相互校验安全，数据传输硬件级加密
log.en: Cross-device TEE security verification and hardware-level encryption for data transfers

log.zh: 跨端隐私体系，包含互联权限管理、互联行为提醒和互联行为记录
log.en: Cross-end privacy protection system that allows you to control permissions, record behavior, and receive alerts about interconnected devices

log.zh: 面向全球化的生命感美学，营造出细腻舒适的视觉和轻盈连贯的动效，多元融合的表达式带来全新的系统美学体验
log.en: Global aesthetics draw inspiration from life itself and change the way your device looks and feels

log.zh: 全新动效语言，带来轻盈连贯的全局动效体验
log.en: New animation language makes interactions with your device wholesome and intuitive

log.zh: 生命力色彩系统，富有生命气息的自然色，让界面焕然一新
log.en: Natural colors bring vibrancy and vitality to every corner of your device

log.zh: 统一的系统字体，为全球而设计
log.en: Our all-new system font supports multiple writing systems

log.zh: 全新天气设计，实时气象引擎创造超现实的视觉体验
log.en: Redesigned Weather app not only gives you important information, but also shows you how it feels outside

log.zh: 全局焦点通知体系，动态展示关键信息变化
log.en: Notifications are focused on important information, presenting it to you in the most efficient way

log.zh: 全新艺术锁屏，让你的每张照片都变成海报，更有动态玻璃材质，亮屏瞬间精美绝伦
log.en: Every photo can look like an art poster on your Lock screen, enhanced by multiple effects and dynamic rendering

log.zh: 桌面图标设计升级，色彩造型全面焕新
log.en: New Home screen icons refresh familiar items with new shapes and colors

log.zh: 自研多重渲染技术，呈现细腻舒适的自然视效
log.en: Our in-house multi-rendering technology makes visuals delicate and comfortable across the whole system

log.zh: 重构多任务窗口管理，统一交互，高效易用
log.en: Multitasking is now even more straightforward and convenient with an upgraded multi-window interface
